comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Yeah, there have ALWAYS been poachers, guys who either have NO licence to hunt because they feel they should not have to pay the state or because they do not think they can be caught or because they think they can hunt at night with a flashlight because they have a flashlight and a gun.  Idiots.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Confession time: I was caught poaching eggs, once.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Hunting regulations were still a novelty in 1913. The state of Ohio instituted a hunting season for the first time that year, but this Bain News Service photo probably is related to the situation in New York State.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Interesting to see the cork board and straight pins used to hold the photo that was being copied here.
